name: Twitter Blur Vision
description: It works on Twitter Desktop version. This snippet blurs all vision related multimedia like Photo, GIF, Video, Background image etc. You can clear the blur by pointing your mouse over (hovering) any blurred photo.
additional_info:
# Features:

- It blurs Photo in tweets,
- GIF,
- Video,
- Photo in Link attachment,
- Profile Picture,
- Photo in Tweets and Follow suggestions.
- Removes Background Image on Home page
- Removes Background Header Image on Help/Support page
